shabtay.coupon.system.repository

Interface CompanyRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Company,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Company,java.lang.Long>

    public interface CompanyRepository
extends org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Company,java.lang.Long>
    CompanyRepository extends CrudRepository
    Author:
    User

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Company findByCompName(java.lang.String compname) 
      Company findById(long id) 
      java.util.List<Coupon> findCompanyCouponByPrice(long compId, double minimumPrice, double maximumPrice)
      This Query : Joins between Company entity and Coupons entity (using comp.coupons AS cp ) , then search for coupons per Company ID And between range of prices (minPrice, maxPrice)
      java.util.List<Coupon> findCompanyCouponByType(long compId, CouponType type)
      This Query : Joins between Company entity and Coupons entity (using comp.coupons AS cp ) , then search for coupons per Company ID And CouponType
      java.util.List<Coupon> findCouponBetweenDates(long compId, java.util.Date startingDate, java.util.Date endingDate)
      This Query : Joins between Company entity and Coupons entity (using comp.coupons AS cp ) , then search for coupons per Company ID And between dates (startDate, endDate)

        @Query(value="SELECT cp FROM COMPANY comp JOIN comp.coupons AS cp WHERE comp.id=:id AND cp.type=:couponType")

      • findCompanyCouponByPrice

        @Query(value="SELECT cp FROM COMPANY comp JOIN comp.coupons AS cp WHERE comp.id=:id AND cp.price>=:minPrice AND cp.price<=:maxPrice")
java.util.List<Coupon> findCompanyCouponByPrice(@Param(value="id")
                                                                                                                                                                                       long compId,

                                                                                                                                                                                       double minimumPrice,
                                                                                                                                                                                       @Param(value="maxPrice")
                                                                                                                                                                                       double maximumPrice)
        This Query : Joins between Company entity and Coupons entity (using comp.coupons AS cp ) , then search for coupons per Company ID And between range of prices (minPrice, maxPrice)

        Returns:
        List Of Coupon

      • findCouponBetweenDates

        @Query(value="SELECT cp FROM COMPANY comp JOIN comp.coupons AS cp WHERE comp.id=:id AND cp.startDate>=:startDate AND cp.endDate<=:endDate")
java.util.List<Coupon> findCouponBetweenDates(@Param(value="id")
                                                                                                                                                                                           long compId,
